review: It's a great little device for streaming youtube or netflix or HBO Go (if your TV doesn't those already), but the reason I wanted to get this was to replace the HDMI cable to my computer. This is where the Chromecast falls a bit short. The maximum definition you can get for streaming local movies is 720p (using a third party application, Videostream for Chromecast), and even then the device will start lagging every once in a while as if it can't quite keep up.
